attributes.action: get the BBC to reuse the "The Chain" by Fleetwood Mac as the theme for next years F1 coverage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the BBC had the F1 coverage last they used "The Chain" by Fleetwood Mac as the theme for the theme of their coverage of the F1 racing.

Bring it back, stick with tradition.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
